title: symbolic link
body: Hi. I like the Ubuntu Bash on Windows 10. However, when I try to make a symbolic link to my Documents folder in the c drive, it doesn't work, as in it does not create a link that I can go to. Any reason?

comments.body: There are about 5 of the same comments - tally the votes and combine please.
Late to the game but your issue the path you're using.  While inside bash you the C drive is located at "/mnt/c".
